mapper.select: /* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.getMember ====== */ SELECT CM.MEM_SEQ , CM.MEM_ID , CM.MEM_TYPE , CM.MEM_NAME , CM.PWD_QUEST , CM.SEX , CM.MEM_NAME_ENG , CM.MEM_BIRTH , SUBSTR(CM.MEM_BIRTH, 1,4) YEAR , SUBSTR(CM.MEM_BIRTH, 5,2) MONTH , SUBSTR(CM.MEM_BIRTH, 7,2) DAY , CM.PWD_QUEST_ANS , CM.MEM_PASSWORD , CM.EMAIL , SUBSTR(CM.EMAIL,(INSTR(CM.EMAIL, '@')+0)) EMAIL3 /* @부터 나머지 이메일 주소 까지 표시 */ , CM.MEM_REGI_NO , CM.ZIP_CODE , CM.ADDRESS , CM.ADDRESS_DTL , CM.TEL_NO1 , CM.TEL_NO2 , CM.TEL_NO3 , CM.HP_NO1 , CM.HP_NO2 , CM.HP_NO3 , CM.NEWSLETTER_YN , CM.PHOTO_FILE_PATH , CM.WORKING_PLACE , CM.SCHOLARSHIP , CM.SECEDE_REASON , CM.RELATION_FIELD , CM.CAREER , CM.TITLE , CM.TITLE TITLE_PATH , CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID , CM.BNDL_REG_YN , CM.LOGIN_CNT , CM.SCSN_YN , CM.MAJR , CM.RECEIVE_MAIL_YN , CM.RECEIVE_SMS_YN , CM.FOREIGN_YN , CM.NAMECHECK_YN , CM.NATION_CODE , CM.COMPANY_ID , CM.G_PIN_YN , CM.G_PIN_KEY1 , CM.G_PIN_KEY2 , CM.MEM_DIV , CM.SCHOOL_SEQ , CM.TUTOR_CLAUSE_AGREE_YN , CM.ASP_ID , CM.AGREE_YN , CM.NONAGE_YN , CM.DELETE_YN , CM.INSERT_DATE , CM.INSERT_USER , CM.UPDATE_DATE , CM.UPDATE_USER , CM.CERTI_NO , CM.CERTI_CHARACTER , CM.CERTI_YN , CM.CERTI_ATTEMPT_CNT , CM.COMP_NM , CM.DEPT_NM , CM.DUTY_NM , CM.REMK , CM.WRONG_REGI_NO , CM.ORG_PW_NULL , CM.ORG_MEM_ID , CM.LAST_LOGIN_YMD , CM.LAST_PW_UPDT_YMD , CM.PW_ERR_NUMBER_TIMES , CM.USE_EXPIRE_YMD , (SELECT AUTH_GROUP_NAME FROM COM_AUTH_GROUP WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND AUTH_GROUP_ID = CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID ) AUTH_GROUP_NAME FROM COM_MEMBER CM WHERE CM.MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq}

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMemberAllExcelList ====== */ SELECT CM.MEM_SEQ , CM.MEM_ID , CM.MEM_TYPE , CM.MEM_NAME , CM.PWD_QUEST , CM.SEX , CM.MEM_NAME_ENG , CM.MEM_BIRTH , CM.PWD_QUEST_ANS , CM.MEM_PASSWORD , CM.EMAIL , CM.MEM_REGI_NO , CM.ZIP_CODE , CM.ADDRESS , CM.ADDRESS_DTL , CM.TEL_NO1 , CM.TEL_NO2 , CM.TEL_NO3 , CM.HP_NO1 , CM.HP_NO2 , CM.HP_NO3 , CM.NEWSLETTER_YN , CM.PHOTO_FILE_PATH , CM.WORKING_PLACE , CM.SCHOLARSHIP , CM.SECEDE_REASON , CM.RELATION_FIELD , CM.CAREER , CM.TITLE , CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID , CM.BNDL_REG_YN , CM.SCSN_YN , CM.MAJR , CM.RECEIVE_MAIL_YN , CM.RECEIVE_SMS_YN , CM.FOREIGN_YN , CM.NAMECHECK_YN , CM.NATION_CODE , CM.COMPANY_ID , CM.G_PIN_YN , CM.G_PIN_KEY1 , CM.G_PIN_KEY2 , CM.MEM_DIV , CM.SCHOOL_SEQ , CM.TUTOR_CLAUSE_AGREE_YN , CM.ASP_ID , CM.AGREE_YN , CM.NONAGE_YN , CM.DELETE_YN , CM.INSERT_USER , CM.UPDATE_DATE , CM.UPDATE_USER , CM.CERTI_NO , CM.CERTI_CHARACTER , CM.CERTI_YN , CM.CERTI_ATTEMPT_CNT , CM.COMP_NM , CM.DEPT_NM , CM.DUTY_NM , CM.REMK , CM.WRONG_REGI_NO , CM.ORG_PW_NULL , CM.ORG_MEM_ID , CM.LAST_LOGIN_YMD , CM.LAST_PW_UPDT_YMD , CM.PW_ERR_NUMBER_TIMES , CM.USE_EXPIRE_YMD , DATE_FORMAT (CM.INSERT_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d') INSERT_DATE , (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM lms_company WHERE COMPANY_ID = CM.COMPANY_ID AND DELETE_YN = 'N') COMPANY_NAME , (SELECT COUNT (MEM_SEQ) FROM COM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE MEM_SEQ = CM.MEM_SEQ) LOGIN_CNT , (SELECT AUTH_GROUP_NAME FROM COM_AUTH_GROUP WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND AUTH_GROUP_ID = CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID) AUTH_GROUP_NAME , '' SCHOOL_NAME , '' INSTITUTE_NAME , '' POSITION , '' CERTIFICATION_DIV FROM COM_MEMBER CM WHERE 1=1 AND CM.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CM.INSERT_DATE DESC, CM.MEM_ID ASC

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMember ====== */
SELECT CM.MEM_SEQ , CM.MEM_ID , CM.MEM_TYPE , CM.MEM_NAME , CM.PWD_QUEST , CM.SEX , CM.MEM_NAME_ENG , CM.MEM_BIRTH , CM.PWD_QUEST_ANS , CM.MEM_PASSWORD '' AS MEM_PASSWORD_ENCRIPTED, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{memPasswordEncript},#{memPasswordEncript})) MEM_PASSWORD_ENCRIPTED, /* 비밀번호( 사용자가 화면에서 입력한 암호화 된 비밀번호 ) */ , CM.EMAIL , CM.MEM_REGI_NO , CM.ZIP_CODE , CM.ADDRESS , CM.ADDRESS_DTL , CM.TEL_NO1 , CM.TEL_NO2 , CM.TEL_NO3 , CM.HP_NO1 , CM.HP_NO2 , CM.HP_NO3 , CM.NEWSLETTER_YN , CM.PHOTO_FILE_PATH , CM.WORKING_PLACE , CM.SCHOLARSHIP , CM.SECEDE_REASON , CM.RELATION_FIELD , CM.CAREER , CM.TITLE , CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID , CM.BNDL_REG_YN
, CM.SCSN_YN , CM.MAJR , CM.RECEIVE_MAIL_YN , CM.RECEIVE_SMS_YN , CM.FOREIGN_YN , CM.NAMECHECK_YN , CM.NATION_CODE , CM.COMPANY_ID , CM.G_PIN_YN , CM.G_PIN_KEY1 , CM.G_PIN_KEY2 , CM.MEM_DIV , CM.SCHOOL_SEQ , CM.TUTOR_CLAUSE_AGREE_YN , CM.ASP_ID , CM.AGREE_YN , CM.NONAGE_YN , CM.DELETE_YN
, CM.INSERT_USER , CM.UPDATE_DATE , CM.UPDATE_USER , CM.CERTI_NO , CM.CERTI_CHARACTER , CM.CERTI_YN , CM.CERTI_ATTEMPT_CNT , CM.COMP_NM , CM.DEPT_NM , CM.DUTY_NM , CM.REMK , CM.WRONG_REGI_NO , CM.ORG_PW_NULL , CM.ORG_MEM_ID , CM.LAST_LOGIN_YMD , CM.LAST_PW_UPDT_YMD , CM.PW_ERR_NUMBER_TIMES , CM.USE_EXPIRE_YMD , DATE_FORMAT(CM.INSERT_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d') INSERT_DATE , (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM lms_company WHERE COMPANY_ID = CM.COMPANY_ID AND DELETE_YN = 'N') COMPANY_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM COM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE MEM_SEQ = CM.MEM_SEQ) LOGIN_CNT , (SELECT AUTH_GROUP_NAME FROM COM_AUTH_GROUP WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND AUTH_GROUP_ID = CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID) AUTH_GROUP_NAME , '' SCHOOL_NAME , '' INSTITUTE_NAME , '' POSITION , '' CERTIFICATION_DIV FROM COM_MEMBER CM WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY CM.AUTH_GROUP_ID ASC, CM.MEM_ID ASC

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMemberCot ====== */ select mem.mem_seq as memSeq, mem.mem_id as memId, mem.mem_name memName, mem.mem_type as memType, SUBSTR(mem.mem_birth,3,7) as memBirth, mem.sex as sex, mem.hp_no1 as hpNo1, mem.hp_no3 as hpNo3, mem.email, SUBSTR(mem.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(mem.email,(INSTR(mem.email, '@')+0)) email2, mem.company_id as companyId, pa.company_name as companyName, pa.ADDRESS from com_member mem left outer join lms_company pa on mem.company_id = pa.company_id where mem.mem_type = 'COT' and mem.delete_yn = 'N' and mem.company_id = #{companyId}

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listChangeSubjectMemberCot ====== */ SELECT distinct mem.mem_seq as memSeq, mem.mem_id as memId, mem.mem_name memName, mem.mem_type as memType, SUBSTR(mem.mem_birth,3,7) as memBirth, mem.sex as sex, mem.hp_no1 as hpNo1, mem.hp_no3 as hpNo3, mem.email, SUBSTR(mem.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(mem.email,(INSTR(mem.email, '@')+0)) email2, mem.company_id as companyId, B.TRANING_PROCESS_ID, FN_GETCOMPAYNAME(mem.company_id) as company_name, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NAME(B.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) as HRD_TRANING_NAME, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NO(B.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) as HRD_TRANING_NO FROM com_member mem inner JOIN lms_subj_tut_mapping tut ON mem.MEM_SEQ = tut.MEM_SEQ and tut.delete_yn = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN lms_traning_process_mapping B ON B.YYYY = tut.YYYY AND B.TERM = tut.TERM AND B.SUBJECT_CODE = tut.SUBJECT_CODE AND B.CLASS = tut.CLASS AND B.company_id = #{companyId} AND B.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = #{traningProcessId} AND B.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE mem.mem_type = 'COT' AND mem.delete_yn = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMemberCcm ====== */ SELECT mem.mem_seq as memSeq, mem.mem_id as memId, mem.mem_name memName, mem.mem_type as memType, SUBSTR(mem.mem_birth,3,7) as memBirth, mem.sex as sex, mem.hp_no1 as hpNo1, mem.hp_no3 as hpNo3, mem.email, SUBSTR(mem.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(mem.email,(INSTR(mem.email, '@')+0)) email2, mem.company_id as companyId, trp.TRANING_PROCESS_ID, trp.HRD_TRANING_NAME, (select count(1) cnt from LMS_SUBJ_CCM_MAPPING where SUBJ_CCM_MAPPING_ID = ccm.SUBJ_CCM_MAPPING_ID) memIdCount, FN_GETCOMPAYNAME(mem.company_id) as company_name FROM com_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_SUBJ_CCM_MAPPING ccm ON ccm.mem_seq = mem.mem_seq AND ccm.company_id = #{companyId} AND ccm.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN lms_traning_process trp ON trp.COMPANY_ID = ccm.COMPANY_ID AND trp.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = ccm.TRANING_PROCESS_ID AND trp.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE mem.mem_type = 'CCM' AND mem.delete_yn = 'N' AND mem.company_id = #{companyId}

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listChangeMemberCcm ====== */ SELECT mem.mem_seq as memSeq, mem.mem_id as memId, mem.mem_name memName, mem.mem_type as memType, SUBSTR(mem.mem_birth,3,7) as memBirth, mem.sex as sex, mem.hp_no1 as hpNo1, mem.hp_no3 as hpNo3, mem.email, SUBSTR(mem.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(mem.email,(INSTR(mem.email, '@')+0)) email2, mem.company_id as companyId, ccm.TRANING_PROCESS_ID, FN_GETCOMPAYNAME(mem.company_id) as company_name, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NAME(ccm.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) as HRD_TRANING_NAME, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NO(ccm.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) as HRD_TRANING_NO FROM com_member mem inner JOIN LMS_SUBJ_CCM_MAPPING ccm ON ccm.mem_seq = mem.mem_seq AND ccm.company_id = #{companyId} AND ccm.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = #{traningProcessId} AND ccm.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE mem.mem_type = 'CCM' AND mem.delete_yn = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMemberStd ====== */ select a.YYYY, a.TERM, a.SUBJECT_CODE, a.CLASS as subClass, d.HRD_TRANING_NAME, e.MEM_SEQ, e.MEM_ID, e.mem_name, e.hp_no1, e.hp_no3, e.email, SUBSTR(e.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(e.email,(INSTR(e.email, '@')+0)) email2, f.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE, f.DEPARTMENT_NAME, f.SUBJECT_NAME, if(a.DELETE_YN = 'N', '재학', '제적') as deleteName, case when a.DELETE_YN = 'Y' then DATE_FORMAT (a.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d') end deleteDt, e.DELETE_YN from LMS_LESSON a, ( select b.YYYY, b.TERM, b.SUBJECT_CODE, b.CLASS, c.HRD_TRANING_NAME from lms_traning_process c , lms_traning_process_mapping b where 1 = 1 and c.COMPANY_ID = b.COMPANY_ID and c.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = b.TRANING_PROCESS_ID and c.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} and c.DELETE_YN = 'N' and b.DELETE_YN = 'N' )d, com_member e, lms_subject f where 1 = 1 and a.YYYY = d.YYYY and a.TERM = d.TERM and a.SUBJECT_CODE = d.SUBJECT_CODE and a.CLASS = d.CLASS and a.MEM_SEQ = e.MEM_SEQ and a.YYYY = f.YYYY and a.TERM = f.TERM and a.SUBJECT_CODE = f.SUBJECT_CODE and a.CLASS = f.CLASS and f.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT'

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.listMemberPrt ====== */ select a.YYYY, a.TERM, a.SUBJECT_CODE, a.CLASS as subClass, d.HRD_TRANING_NAME, e.MEM_SEQ, e.mem_name, e.hp_no1, e.hp_no3, e.email, SUBSTR(e.email,1,1) as email1, SUBSTR(e.email,(INSTR(e.email, '@')+0)) email2, f.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE, f.DEPARTMENT_NAME, f.SUBJECT_NAME from lms_subj_ins_mapping a, ( select b.YYYY, b.TERM, b.SUBJECT_CODE, b.CLASS, c.HRD_TRANING_NAME from lms_traning_process c , lms_traning_process_mapping b where 1 = 1 and c.COMPANY_ID = b.COMPANY_ID and c.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = b.TRANING_PROCESS_ID and c.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} and c.DELETE_YN = 'N' and b.DELETE_YN = 'N' )d, com_member e, lms_subject f where 1 = 1 and a.YYYY = d.YYYY and a.TERM = d.TERM and a.SUBJECT_CODE = d.SUBJECT_CODE and a.CLASS = d.CLASS and a.MEM_SEQ = e.MEM_SEQ and a.YYYY = f.YYYY and a.TERM = f.TERM and a.SUBJECT_CODE = f.SUBJECT_CODE and a.CLASS = f.CLASS and a.DELETE_YN = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.getMemberChangeApplicationCcn ====== */ SELECT a.mem_seq, a.mem_id, a.mem_name, a.mem_type, a.status, a.mem_birth, a.mem_regi_no, substr(a.mem_regi_no, 1,6) mem_regi_no1, a.sex, a.company_id, ( SELECT TRANING_PROCESS_ID FROM lms_traning_process_mapping WHERE 1 = 1 and yyyy = b.yyyy and term = b.term and subject_code = b.subject_code and class = b.class and delete_yn = 'N' and company_id = #{companyId} ) as traning_process_id, a.email, a.title, a.scholarship, FN_GETCODENAME('JOB_POSITION',a.title) title_name, FN_GETCODENAME('QFE_ABILITY',a.scholarship) scholarship_name, a.hp_no1, a.hp_no2, a.hp_no3, substr(a.mem_birth, 1,4) year, substr(a.mem_birth, 5,2) month, substr(a.mem_birth, 7,2) day, a.working_place, a.related_research_organization_name, a.related_research_year, a.same_site_work_year, a.same_site_work_cd, a.participate_start_date, a.participate_end_date, a.delete_yn, a.updt_application_status, CASE WHEN a.status = '1' THEN '승인대기' WHEN a.status = '2' THEN '승인' WHEN a.status = '3' THEN '반려' END top_status_name, a.retun_reason, FN_GETSUBJECT_NAME(b.yyyy, b.term, b.subject_code, b.class) as subject_name, (SELECT company_name FROM lms_company WHERE company_id = a.company_id) as top_company_name, (SELECT ADDRESS FROM lms_company WHERE company_id = a.company_id) as top_address, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NAME((SELECT traning_process_id FROM lms_traning_process_mapping WHERE 1 = 1 and yyyy = b.yyyy and term = b.term and subject_code = b.subject_code and class = b.class and delete_yn = 'N' and company_id = #{companyId})) as topHrdTraningName, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NO((SELECT traning_process_id FROM lms_traning_process_mapping WHERE 1 = 1 and yyyy = b.yyyy and term = b.term and subject_code = b.subject_code and class = b.class and delete_yn = 'N' and company_id = #{companyId})) as topHrdTraningNo, b.yyyy, b.term, b.subject_code, b.class as subClass FROM com_member a INNER JOIN lms_subj_tut_mapping b ON b.MEM_SEQ = a.mem_seq AND b.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mem_seq = #{memSeq} AND a.delete_yn = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.getMemberChangeApplicationCcm ====== */ select a.mem_seq, a.mem_id, a.mem_name, a.mem_type, a.mem_birth, a.mem_regi_no, substr(a.mem_regi_no, 1,6) mem_regi_no1, a.sex, /* F:여자, M:남자 */ a.company_id, a.email, a.title, a.scholarship, FN_GETCODENAME('JOB_POSITION',a.title) title_name, /* 직위 */ FN_GETCODENAME('QFE_ABILITY',a.scholarship) scholarship_name, /* 학력 */ a.hp_no1, a.hp_no2, a.hp_no3, substr(a.mem_birth, 1,4) year, substr(a.mem_birth, 5,2) month, substr(a.mem_birth, 7,2) day, a.working_place, /* 근무형태 */ a.related_research_organization_name, /* 관련연구 기관명 */ a.related_research_year, /* 관련연구 기간 */ a.same_site_work_year, /* 동일현장 경력년도 */ a.same_site_work_cd, /* 동일현장 경력코드 */ a.participate_start_date, /* 참여일자 시작일 */ a.participate_end_date, /* 참여일자 종료일 */ a.delete_yn, /* 삭제여부 */ a.updt_application_status, /* 담당자변경 진행상태 */ (select company_name from lms_company where company_id = a.company_id) as topCompanyName, /* 기업명 */ (select ADDRESS from lms_company where company_id = a.company_id) as topAddress, /* 소재지 */ LSC.TRANING_PROCESS_ID, /* 훈련과정아이디 */ LSC.HRD_TRANING_NAME as topHrdTraningName, /* 훈련과정명 */ LSC.HRD_TRANING_NO as topHrdTraningNo, /* 훈련과정번호 */ case when a.status = '1' then '승인대기' when a.status = '2' then '승인' when a.status = '3' then '반려' end topStatusName, /* 진행상태명 */ a.status, a.retun_reason /* 반려사유 */ from com_member a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT C.TRANING_PROCESS_ID,C.HRD_TRANING_NAME,C.HRD_TRANING_NO,B.MEM_SEQ,B.COMPANY_ID FROM lms_subj_ccm_mapping B left outer join lms_traning_process C on C.COMPANY_ID = B.COMPANY_ID and C.TRANING_PROCESS_ID = B.TRANING_PROCESS_ID LIMIT 0,1 ) LSC ON LSC.MEM_SEQ = a.mem_seq and LSC.COMPANY_ID = a.COMPANY_ID where 1 = 1 and a.mem_seq = #{memSeq}
/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.getMemberCnt ====== */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COM_MEMBER CM WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: /* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.updateMemberChangeApplication ====== */ UPDATE COM_MEMBER SET UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), UPDATE_USER = #{sessionMemSeq}, SEX = #{sex}, MEM_REGI_NO = #{memRegiNo}, MEM_BIRTH = #{memBirth}, HP_NO1 = #{hpNo1}, HP_NO2 = #{hpNo2}, HP_NO3 = #{hpNo3}, EMAIL = #{email}, WORKING_PLACE = #{workingPlace}, RELATED_RESEARCH_ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{relatedResearchOrganizationName}, RELATED_RESEARCH_YEAR = #{relatedResearchYear}, SAME_SITE_WORK_YEAR = #{sameSiteWorkYear}, SAME_SITE_WORK_CD = #{sameSiteWorkCd}, PARTICIPATE_START_DATE = #{participateStartDate}, PARTICIPATE_END_DATE = #{participateEndDate}, UPDT_APPLICATION_STATUS = #{updtApplicationStatus}, SCHOLARSHIP = #{scholarship}, TITLE = #{title} WHERE MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq}
mapper.delete: /* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.UserActMapper.deleteMember ========= */ UPDATE COM_MEMBER SET UPDATE_DATE = NOW() , UPDATE_USER = IFNULL(#{sessionMemSeq} , '2009USER0000001') , DELETE_YN = 'Y' , SCSN_YN = 'Y' WHERE MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq}

/* ====== kr.co.sitglobal.oklms.lu.member.service.impl.MemberMapper.deleteChangeMember ====== */ UPDATE COM_MEMBER SET UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), UPDATE_USER = #{sessionMemSeq}, UPDT_APPLICATION_STATUS = NULL, PARTICIPATE_START_DATE = NULL, STATUS = NULL
WHERE 1 = 1 AND MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq}
